import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import img1 from "../images/slide1.jpg"; import img2 from "../images/slide2.jpg"; import img3 from "../images/slide3.jpg"; import logo from "../images/logoblackevent-removebg-preview.png"; import Nav from "./Nav"; const HomePage = () => { const [state] = React.useState({ title: "ShubhKaryaa Events", text: "We create. You celebrate", image: "/images/man-01.png", }); return (

{/*{state.title} */}

{/*

{state.text}

*/}
Customer Employee
); }; export default HomePage;
